methods.name: getElytraTextureLocation
javadoc: Gets the special Elytra texture for the player.

methods.name: getSkinLocation
javadoc: Returns true if the username has an associated skin.

methods.name: getSkinTextureLocation
javadoc: Returns the ResourceLocation associated with the player's skin

methods.name: isCapeLoaded
javadoc: Checks if this instance of AbstractClientPlayer has any associated player data.

methods.name: isSkinLoaded
javadoc: Returns true if the player has an associated skin.

methods.name: isSpectator
javadoc: Returns true if the player is in spectator mode.
